import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../tailwind.output.css' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' type Inputs = { username: string name: string email: string password: string password2: string } export const SignUpForm = () => { const { register, handleSubmit, errors, watch } = useForm() const onSubmit = (data: Inputs) => { console.log('data', data) alert('Registration successful!') } const [passwordShown, setPasswordShown] = useState(false) const togglePasswordVisibility = () => { setPasswordShown(!passwordShown) } return (
{errors.username && errors.username.type === 'required' && ( )} {errors.username && errors.username.type === 'minLength' && ( )}
{errors.name && errors.name.type === 'required' && ( )} {errors.name && errors.name.type === 'minLength' && ( )}
{errors.email && errors.email.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.password && errors.password.type === 'required' && ( )} {errors.password && errors.password.type === 'minLength' && ( )} { return value === watch('password') }, })} /> {errors.password2 && errors.password2.type === 'required' && ( )} {errors.password2 && errors.password2.type === 'validate' && ( )}
) }
